titlestmt.titleproper: Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers' Files, Executive and Program Officers' Files
A Guide to the Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers' Files, Executive and Program Officers' Files FA1831

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:57:48 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers' Files, Executive and Program Officers' Files

physdesc.extent: 34 boxes (33 letter document containers and 1 half letter document container)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in three series:

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to RAC in 2016 and 2017 by the SSRC and ingested by RAC as Accessions 2016:005, 2016:010, 2016:074, 2016:076, 2017:021, and 2017:024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains SSRC committee proposals and planning documents, correspondence, meeting files, SSRC publications, and research reports of:
Stanley Heginbotham, Vice President from 1990-1995
Richard Rockwell, Program Officer from 1977-1991
Robert Pearson Files, Program Officer, files from 1987-1990
Frank Kessel, Program Director for the Culture, Health and Human Development Program, files from 1987-1990
Susan Bronson, Progam Associate, later Program Director, for the Program on the Former Soviet Union from 1991-1997
David Sills, Executive Associate from 1973-1988
David Szanton, Executive Associate from 1975-1991

did.unittitle: Vice President

physdesc.extent: 14 letter document box and 1 half-letter document box

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains files of SSRC Vice President Stanley Heginbotham, who served in the role from 1990-1995.

did.unittitle: Stanley Heginbotham's Files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Stanley Heginbotham served as Vice President of the SSRC from 1990-1995. Stanley Heginbotham's files contain proposals for the SSRC's Comparative and Transnational Seed Grant Competition, meeting materials, financial reports, budget files, and correspondence. The subseries also holds material created by David Featherman who served president of the SSRC from 1989-1995.

Richard Rockwell, Program Officer from 1977-1991

Susan Bronson, Program Associate, later Program Director, for the Program on the Former Soviet Union from 1991-1997

did.unittitle: Richard Rockwell's Files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Richard Rockwell was an SSRC Program Officer from 1977-1991. This subseries contains meeting materials, reports related to Survey of Income and Program Participation (SIPP), Institute of Peace and Security Studies (IPSS) correspondence and grant files, and Richard Rockwell's correspondence files.

Frank Kessel's Files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Frank Kessel served as SSRC Program Director for the Culture, Health and Human Development Program, files from 1987-1990. The subseries contains files related to conference planning, life course research, research reports, and psychology.

Susan Bronson's Files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Susan Bronson was Program Associate, and later Director, for the Program on the Former Soviet Union at the Social Science Research Council from 1991-1997. The subseries primarily contains files related to the review process of the international program at the SSRC.

Executive Associates

physdesc.extent: 7 letter document boxes and 1 half-letter document box

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains files of SSRC executive associates David Sills and David Szanton.
David Szanton was an executive associate at the Social Science Research Council from 1975-1991.
David Sills was an executive associate at the Social Science Research Council from 1973-1988. In 1988, he retired with emeritus status.

did.unittitle: David Sills' Files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The subseries contains the files of David Sills, executive associate at the Social Science Research Council from 1973-1988. In 1988, he retired with emeritus status. The subseries includes meeting materials, publications, reports, copies of SSRC bylaws, and memos.

David L. Szanton's Correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This subseries contains David Szanton's general correspondence and correspondence related to Area Studies and Southeast Asia. Szanton was an Executive Associate at the Social Science Research Council from 1975-1991. More correspondence can be found in Social Science Research Council records, Near and Middle East, Record Group 3, Series 9; Series 2: Joint Committee on the Comparative Study of Muslim Societies, 1984-1995. The files are David Szanton Chronological Correspondence Files A-Z from 1988-1990.
